channel.title: Uzoxpk || 728 || Completionist Cape || Many Bosses || Lovely Community
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/n39g8h.png[/img]
[SIZE=5][U]Why would you want to join?[/U][/SIZE]
We are not a Server that is Online for the Donations we are here to give you the best RSPS experience, and fun thats all we care for we listen to our community we don't sell staff and such you have to earn your way up. We also listen to every single Bug report, Suggestion and everything else that effects the playersbase.
There are many features in-game down here is a list of what we have like it simply click the download client link and start playing.
[SIZE=4][COLOR="#0000CD"]Skill-Points[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Gain 1 skilling point for leveling up any skill including combat, spend them in the skilling shop for awesome rewards.
[SIZE=5]Links:[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://www.luzoxpk.net/images/forums.png[/img]Site[url=http://luzoxpk.net]Click Here[/url] [IMG]http://www.luzoxpk.net/images/PlayNow.png[/img]Download Client[url=http://luzoxpk.net/luzoxpk.jar]Click Here[/url] [IMG]http://www.luzoxpk.net/images/PlayNow.png[/img]Webclient [url=http://luzoxpk.net/webclient]Click Here[/url] [IMG]http://www.luzoxpk.net/images/vote.png[/img]Vote [url=http://luzoxpk.net/vote]Click Here[/url]
- VPS Hosted 4GB - 24/7 - No lag - Stable Economy - 100% Uptime - P'king - 138 combat - Daily Updates - Professional Owner and staff - Active Clean Forums - Option to switch your Items look to 634 revision - Loyalty points 250 per hour - Shops Not to many that floods the server - Dominion Tower - Frost Dragons - Tormented Demons - All godwars Dungeon bosses INCL Nex - Bones on altar. - All 24 skills working - All prayers working. - Revenants. - Queen Black Dragon - Fight Kiln - Fight Caves - Dungeoneering! - Money pouch - Working clan wars! - Slayer - Auto-Voting - Auto-Donate - Great PvP and switching - Edgevile Home - Many more features coming soon
Don't mind the media its what every other 718 has but this is my first time 718 and im learning fast, don't call it bad before you tried this out [U]Why should you join?[/U] We take our community verry serious and we take every sugestion in consideration with you.
Media
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/7e520cbd7048a1b7b651b80d14c83468.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/704bdcd2ed4977628127415a14d5e597.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/9a5212e281ad4f8b6d9ba954332d1bb5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/657280d9c9eb7d547c9f040accc3de08.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/34c87c6e402c3e8f5375998bfaf146b2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/25900557ce2cf6239a17b22e63800220.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/670ccf9972d4a8c9acc8ea278d7d5da1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/0b96af6d577e058e6b91e96b7131af1e.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/28d2ed81c34f8368edec7ac4a99a92f0.png[/img]
Thats the media for now i know its nothing special but im still learning i hope to see "You" in Luzoxpk.
Credits Matrix team, FreedomX, Santa_hat, Jamal for helping, Boomscape for helping, Zivik for teaching me many months ago.

item.description:
@I_Smoke_Kush wrote:

[SIZE=5][U]Why would you want to join?[/U][/SIZE]

We are not a Server that is Online for the Donations we are here to give you the best RSPS experience, and fun thats all we care for we listen to our community we don’t sell staff and such you have to earn your way up.
We also listen to every single Bug report, Suggestion and everything else that effects the playersbase.

There are many features in-game down here is a list of what we have like it simply click the download client link and start playing.

[SIZE=4][COLOR="#0000CD"]Skill-Points[/COLOR][/SIZE]

Gain 1 skilling point for leveling up any skill including combat, spend them in the skilling shop for awesome rewards.

Don’t mind the media its what every other 718 has but this is my first time 718 and im learning fast, don’t call it bad before you tried this out [U]Why should you join?[/U] We take our community verry serious and we take every sugestion in consideration with you.
